name: catachresis
text: I had a print-out of this strip on my bedroom door for a long time

name: highpitch_83
text: i wish I was still in college so I could put this on the door to my room.  I'd be neck deep in RUUUUUDE titties!

text: I wonder why the strip is rated so low, it's fantastic!

text: are you serious?

text: R U SERIOUS

name: semiquaver
text: Are you kidding this is a frigging fantastic drawing...

name: cinderfella
text: That is a powerful big stein.

name: farqussus
text: I am curious as to what rests on Cornelius' head. Is it his reading hair?

name: farqussus
text: never mind. I see the date.

name: snowman
text:
Reading hair!

Hahahahahahahaha

name: charchar
text: It's not so much a stein as a beer stocking.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Oh wow I was just thinking the same thing!

Chubby for you, madam!

name: trollcollins
text:
When I was young I thought University would be like this when I eventually got there.

But nope! My secret hopes of being an Edwardian gentleman were dashed. Then some frat boys vomited on them. :(

name: boredom_man
text: Were they the Strachey brothers?

name: deusoma
text: So Cornelius has been wearing the same pince-nez for a hundred years? I'd have figured even he had more fashion sense than that .

name: bex
text: At first I mistook the wooden floor lines for moving line things and I thought that the floor was a big treadmill or his chair was zooming around.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: That's entirely possible. It could certainly be the Time Treadmill , landing us in 1902.
